name: maggic-mlp
title: MAGGIC-MLP Features
description: Set of extracted features for MAGGIC-MLP

entity.name: pid
entity.description: A unique identifier assigned to each patient in the cohort.

entity.name: encounterId
entity.description: A unique identifier for each hospital encounter.

sampling.description: Use the end time of encounters as the reference time point.

feature.name: gender
feature.description: Gender of the patient

feature.name: age
feature.description: Age of the patient at reference point

feature.name: nyha
feature.description: The latest value of the New York Heart Assessment as LOINC Code

feature.name: value
feature.description: The latest numeric result

feature.name: value
feature.description: The latest numeric result

filter.name: heart-failure
filter.filter: icd10Code.startsWith('I50') or icd10Code.startsWith('I11.0') or icd10Code.startsWith('I13.0') or icd10Code.startsWith('I13.2') or icd10Code.startsWith('I26.0') or icd10Code.startsWith('I25.5') or icd10Code.startsWith('I09.81') or icd10Code.startsWith('I97.13')

feature.name: occurred_prior_to_18_months
feature.description: Indicates whether the condition was diagnosed 18 months or more before the reference time point, corresponding to the criteria for 'Heart Failure (HF) â‰¥ 18 Months Prior.'

feature.name: has_chronic_obstructive_pulmonary_disease
feature.description: Whether the patient has the Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD).

value.path: icd10Code.startsWith('J40') or icd10Code.startsWith('J41') or icd10Code.startsWith('J42') or icd10Code.startsWith('J43') or icd10Code.startsWith('J44')

feature.name: has_atrial_fibrillation
feature.description: Whether the patient has the Atrial Fibrillations.

feature.name: has_myocardial_infarction
feature.description: Whether the patient has the Myocardial Infarctions.

feature.name: has_pci
feature.description: Whether the patient has the Percutaneous Coronary Intervention (PCI).

feature.name: has_cabg
feature.description: Whether the patient has the Coronary Artery Bypass Graft (CABG) Surgeries.

feature.name: has_stroke
feature.description: Whether the patient has the strokes.

value.path: icd10Code.startsWith('I61') or icd10Code.startsWith('I62') or icd10Code.startsWith('I63') or icd10Code.startsWith('I64') or icd10Code.startsWith('I60')

feature.name: has_diabetes
feature.description: Whether the patient has the diabetes.

value.path: icd10Code.startsWith('E10') or icd10Code.startsWith('E11') or icd10Code.startsWith('E12') or icd10Code.startsWith('E13') or icd10Code.startsWith('E14')

filter.name: beta-blocker-use
filter.filter: medicationCode.startsWith('C07AA') or medicationCode.startsWith('C07AB') or medicationCode.startsWith('C07AG') or medicationCode.startsWith('C07BA') or medicationCode.startsWith('C07BB') or medicationCode.startsWith('C07BG') or medicationCode.startsWith('C07CA') or medicationCode.startsWith('C07CB') or medicationCode.startsWith('C07CG') or medicationCode.startsWith('C07DA') or medicationCode.startsWith('C07DB') or medicationCode.startsWith('C07DG') or medicationCode.startsWith('C07FB') or medicationCode.startsWith('C07FX')

feature.name: administered
feature.description: Whether the medication administered.

filter.name: ace-inhibitors-arb-use
filter.description: Find ACE Inhibitors / ARB Use medications.
filter.filter: medicationCode.startsWith('C09AA') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09BA') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09BB02') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09BB03') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09BB04') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09BB05') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09BB06') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09BB07') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09BB08') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09BB09') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09BB010') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09BB011') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09BB012') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09BX01') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09BX02') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09BX03') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09BX04') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09BX05') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09CA') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09DA') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09DB') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09DX01') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09DX02') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09DX03') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09DX04') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09DX05') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09DX06') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09DX07') or medicationCode.startsWith('C09DX04')

feature.name: administered
feature.description: Whether the medication administered.

feature.name: current_smoker
feature.description: Indicates whether the patient's latest smoking status, collected within the last three years before the reference time point, indicates s/he is a current smoker. This includes codes for active tobacco use.

feature.name: ex_smoker
feature.description: Indicates whether the patient's latest smoking status, collected within the last three years before the reference time point, specifies that s/he is a former smoker. This status is represented by the code for 'Ex-smoker' (SNOMED code: 8517006).

feature.name: never_smoker
feature.description: Indicates whether the patient's latest smoking status, collected within the last three years before the reference time point, specifies that s/he has never smoked. This status is represented by the code for 'Never smoked' (SNOMED code: 266919005).

feature.name: unknown_smoker
feature.description: Indicates whether the patient's smoking status, collected within the last three years before the reference time point, is unknown. This includes cases where the code for 'Smoking status unknown' (SNOMED code: 266927001) is present or when no smoking status code is available.

feature.name: deceased
feature.description: Mortality recorded within the 12 months following the reference time point, which corresponds to the end of the encounter.
